action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is an abstract collection of pixelated shapes in various colors. There are four distinct shapes, each a different color: purple, green, pink, and orange. Each shape is made up of square blocks arranged in a pattern that could be interpreted as Tetris-like pieces. The purple and pink shapes resemble a "T" or a cross, the green shape looks like a "Z" or an "N," and the orange shape resembles an "L" or a reversed "J." The background is white, and the overall image has a minimalist, game-like aesthetic.
continue
